short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Limits the number of open tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This limits the number of tabs you can open. You can configure the tab limit and configure when you are warned that you are close to the limit. If you open tabs beyond the limit, chrome will prevent any of those new tabs from opening.
